testcase.classname: User registration and message compose functionality in English language
testcase.name: Verify that the user is able to compose and send the message
testcase.system-out: Given Login with valid name.................................................passed When click on the user icon.................................................passed And click on the link "Inbox"...............................................passed And click on the compose....................................................passed And Enter Send To, Subject, Message "virat" ,"Test", "Test".................passed And click on the Send Message...............................................passed Then Message should be send successfully....................................passed
